title: How to Do Wild Hair | AXE | Instagroom
description:
This is how Jonah channels his inner warrior: with a wild, messy hairdo. 

THE TOOLS:
AXE Urban Messy Look Matte Gel 

THE STEPS:
1. Towel dry
2. Squeeze a blob of gel into hair
3. Mess it up

Subscribe to the AXE channel for more grooming tips.

asset.author: AXE

transcripts: Growing up with bright orange hair in the nineties and noughties is the worst thing ever. When I wake up, get my hair wet, dry it with a towel. Then I take some gel, put it in my hand and squeeze it into my hair. I’ve definitely shifted from being very uncomfortable with it to being extremely comfortable with it.
